javadoc:
Task for operating on programs. Will open and close a transaction around the
 work.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Construct a new Task that will operate on a program.

params.name: program
params.comment: the program that the task will operate on.

params.name: title
params.comment: title the title associated with the task

params.name: canCancel
params.comment: true means that the user can cancel the task

params.name: hasProgress
params.comment:
true means that the dialog should show a progress
            indicator

params.name: isModal
params.comment:
true means that the dialog is modal and the task has to
            complete or be canceled before any other action can occur

name: ProgramTask
comment:
Task for operating on programs. Will open and close a transaction around the
 work.
